Articles.Content:
Thread moved

Edited September 8, 2014 by Roflcopterkklol
Well these look like fun, what version are they built in/for?

Thread moved

Edited September 8, 2014 by Roflcopterkklol

Those deserve the title of beast.

Even jebediah wouldn't fly one without being blackmailed.
haha cheers man, glad you like them

Updating this thread.

By the way has anyone had any problems downloading/installing any of these craft?

if so please let me know.

Guess i better bump this thread before i lose it.

Also i am taking requests for craft people would like me to build at the moment, i am getting near finished on a few of my own projects so i have time to look at some new ones.

Also feel free to post some craft you are having problems with and i will see what i can do about fixing it for you and showing you how to fix the problem in the future.

And if you are bored, have a go of Titan/Goliath, my two new craft, both are excellent to fly and will go to the Mun without refueling.

Guess i better bump this thread before i lose it.

Also i am taking requests for craft people would like me to build at the moment, i am getting near finished on a few of my own projects so i have time to look at some new ones.

You can subscribe to your own threads to receive notifications of any new post in them, bumping for the only reason of keeping one of your threads in the first page is generally frowned upon, I think.

Rune. I mean, you are pulling other people's thread with more responses down.
